page.title: 07Entertainment
page.content: In our small survey of those activities that could be best described as entertainment the most popular was sport.This was usually seen on television ,though many did visit local football and rugby clubs.The most popular entertainment was to visit "discos" in the local villages.This was especially popular with the girls in our sample.Other entertainments included,visits to various places of interest ,such as Alton Towers or safari parks.Places such as stately Homes,or historic buildings were of some interest but only to a minority.However much entertainment centred around the home and the family,whether it be games or television.
